SEARCH
Package ru.introguzzle.parsers.common.function

Interface ThrowingPredicate<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the input to the predicate
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface ThrowingPredicate<T>
Functional interface representing a predicate that can throw a checked exception.

This interface is similar to Predicate, but allows the test(Object) method to throw any Throwable. This can be useful when using predicates that may throw checked exceptions.

  • Method Details

    • test

      boolean test(T t) throws Throwable
      Evaluates this predicate on the given argument.
      Parameters:
      t - the input argument
      Returns:
      true if the input argument matches the predicate, otherwise false
      Throws:
      Throwable - if an error occurs during evaluation

    • and

      @NotNull default @NotNull ThrowingPredicate<T> and(@NotNull @NotNull ThrowingPredicate<? super T> other)
      Returns a composed ThrowingPredicate that represents a short-circuiting logical AND of this predicate and another. If this predicate is false, then the other predicate is not evaluated.
      Parameters:
      other - a predicate that will be logically-ANDed with this predicate
      Returns:
      a composed ThrowingPredicate that represents the short-circuiting logical AND of this predicate and the other predicate
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if other is null

    • or

      @NotNull default @NotNull ThrowingPredicate<T> or(@NotNull @NotNull ThrowingPredicate<? super T> other)
      Returns a composed ThrowingPredicate that represents a short-circuiting logical OR of this predicate and another. If this predicate is true, then the other predicate is not evaluated.
      Parameters:
      other - a predicate that will be logically-ORed with this predicate
      Returns:
      a composed ThrowingPredicate that represents the short-circuiting logical OR of this predicate and the other predicate
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if other is null

      Returns a ThrowingPredicate that represents the logical negation of this predicate.
      Returns:

    • asPredicate

      @NotNull default @NotNull Predicate<T> asPredicate()

    • asPredicate

      @NotNull default @NotNull Predicate<T> asPredicate(@NotNull @NotNull Transformer<? extends RuntimeException> handler)
      Converts this ThrowingPredicate to a standard Predicate, transforming any checked exceptions thrown by this predicate into unchecked exceptions using the specified Transformer.
      Parameters:
      handler - the transformer that converts checked exceptions to runtime exceptions
      Returns:
      a Predicate that wraps this predicate and handles checked exceptions
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if handler is null

    • asPredicate

      @NotNull default @NotNull Predicate<T> asPredicate(@NotNull @NotNull Handler handler)
      Converts this ThrowingPredicate to a standard Predicate, handling any checked exceptions thrown by this predicate using the specified Handler. If an exception occurs, the handler is called, and the predicate returns false.
      Parameters:
      handler - the exception handler to process checked exceptions
      Returns:
      a Predicate that wraps this predicate and handles checked exceptions by returning false on error
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if handler is null
